name: Damons Quest
description: This is a early RPG game that is based in a old medieval type Era with magic and monsters and other things the stories main character is Damon a half Nord half demon breed who loses his throne to a lord of his court that decided to over throw his rule and his quest is to gather a group train gain and fight to get his once great kingdom back from the Guy that took it from him and turned his kingdom against him through lies and manipulation
